name: parasprite
description: This challenge is graciously contributed by Pacific Northwest National Laboratory. To convert their flag to our flag format, replace a string like `"hello world"` with `flag{hello world}` (keeping the space, no underscore) when submitting the flag. If you have any trouble with the flag submission, ping the MailBot on Discord.
